channel.title: How Can I
channel.description:
Hello, how can i make my server 24/7? because when i log off the people that want to play cant. my server is working on hamachi at the moment. how can i make the server online while my computer is off?? is it possible?
if it isnt can you please tell me how i can run my server without hamachi so people can connect to it without it?

item.title: How Can I
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

[quote=“sjoukjeowns, post:6, topic:328114”][quote author=adamhelloman8 link=topic=424496.msg3117642#msg3117642 date=1265170277]
free? use your computer and leave it running 24/7 xD.
and also gtfo hamachi. its useless.

[/quote] can you help me a bit more on that? i dontknow what do do on it i am gd at computers but i just dontknow how to get a host? does that program keep it 24/7?
True use the newest restarted someone released it it knows when a server dc’d and automaticly restarts it
Search at downloads “restarter” u will find it:)![/quote]

Read full topic

[quote=“adamhelloman8, post:5, topic:328114”]free? use your computer and leave it running 24/7 xD.
and also gtfo hamachi. its useless.[/quote]

Search at downloads “restarter” u will find it:)!

item.title: How Can I
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Samih1996, post:3, topic:328114”][quote author=sikeo link=topic=424496.msg3117394#msg3117394 date=1265145034]
I suggest you get a Dedicated Server, or a VPS.

For a start, try one of FrugooSofts VPS, if you want to be a lil’ more serious, try 1and1 Dedicated Servers.

They’re expensive, but worth it.

What is a VPS/Dedi?:

A VPS is a Virtual Private Server, it’s pratically a computer, but you access it through remote desktop control. Once your on your VPS upload the files and press run =)

Try using an online tutorial
[/quote] isnt there anything FREE i havent got money i just want to make a server so people can play on it.[/quote]

add donating using paypal lol

Read full topic

item.title: How Can I
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

I suggest you get a Dedicated Server, or a VPS.

For a start, try one of FrugooSofts VPS, if you want to be a lil’ more serious, try 1and1 Dedicated Servers.

They’re expensive, but worth it.

What is a VPS/Dedi?:

A VPS is a Virtual Private Server, it’s pratically a computer, but you access it through remote desktop control. Once your on your VPS upload the files and press run =)

Try using an online tutorial
